title: Bankruptcy court admits Punjab National Bankâ€™s insolvency resolution plea against Arshiya
description: Punjab National Bank's CIRP plea against Arshiya Ltd has been approved by Mumbai NCLT, with Nitin Vishwanath Panchal being appointed as RP. Officers have been asked to provide findings within a week.
